roleset.name: cause amazement
roleset.note: WOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wow' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet entry Experiencer obj. (from wow.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: like, wow, man
example.text: He 's put a fresh spin on material that could come off terribly cliched; for example, the way Susie wows an audience the first time she sings with the Baker Boys.
example.arg: the first time she sings with the Baker Boys

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John wowed jaded audiences worldwide with his rendition of ``I'm a Little Teapot.''
example.arg: with his rendition of ``I'm a Little Teapot''
